alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 6:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Widespread lowland flooding is occurring for several miles east and west of the river. Also several county roads are underwater south of the gage site near the Pearl River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.5 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 21.3 Mon 5 am CDT 21.5 21.3 21.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued later this morning at 10 AM CDT.
